name: QuoteAway
description: QuoteAway is a social media website designed for users to share their quotes and read quotes from others. QuoteAway is 100% built from scratch. The website allows user to create an account and maintain their list of quotes and their profile. Other quotes on the platform appear on the home feed.
note: The hosted application unfortunately had to be taken down owing to the changes in Heroku free tier policy. The code is available on Github.
stack: React, Spring boot, MySQL, Spring data JPA

name: Bank Application
description: A full stack web application that imitates bank operations such as deposit, withdraw, transfer and balance enquiry, fixed deposit and loans. Involves multi threading concepts for EMI payment and interest calculation.
